title: [Large-Scale] Science Communication Competency Enhancement Program Using Culture-Based Digital Drama

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in foundational scientific theories and job-related specialized knowledge
context.additional_context: Mobile-based course applying a digital drama learning model integrated with local culture to enhance science communication skills for in-service practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy using culture-based drama content from digital textbooks.
Learners can plan, produce, and share science scenarios linked to local cultural elements with peers.
Learners can apply the four core skills of scientific communication (storytelling, visual expression, emotional delivery, audience analysis) through drama-based microlearning modules.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
